about_the_game:
Would you sacrifice years of your life to try to save the ones you love?



Crown Code Chronicles is a story-driven, JRPG-style game with platformer elements; featuring a unique take on the traditional turn-based system. The game takes place in a magical medieval fantasy world, and journeys back and forth anywhere from prehistoric times all the way to a cyberpunk-style futuristic world.

Prince Vareus (a.k.a Var) witnesses his father's death, and after a series of events, ends up using an ancient relic to time travel in order to save his father's life. He unknowingly unleashes the greatest threat to existence and must recruit a team of the most powerful fighters throughout time to help defeat that threat, known as Vierus.



-Captivating and emotional story that travels through past and future worlds depicting real life themes of loss, love, friendship, and respair

-Unique turn-based combat system where players can strategically place and swap characters to different positions in order to use different abilities

-No random encounters! Enemies are on-screen so you can avoid non-essential battles using various game mechanics

-An all new 3 vs 3 chess-like strategy mini game

-Original soundtrack created using sample track by one of the original creators of the game

32-bit Pixel Art Graphics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster compatible processor or System on a Chip (SoC)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver

short_description: Crown Code Chronicles is a story-driven, JRPG-style game with a unique turn-based combat system. Inspired by titles like Chrono Trigger, Chrono Cross, FFX, & Child Of Light. Experience this emotional roller coaster as Vareus; a prince who uses an ancient relic to time travel to save his loved ones!
